Articles.Content: need a tanker for my duna mining operation. It needs to be able to reach duna orbit offload fuel and land again with no parachutes. im using kw rocketry and usi ftt

My Orca would be perfect for that, since one of it's rated missions is to land base modules on Duna. Just put your flavor of fuel tank on the bay.

 

Rune. Hope that helps!
